property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Wall Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you have been bitten with fangs of granite, you start to long for the ivory sabers of tigers." - Norin the Wary

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mother once told me angels sing their swords' names with each strike." - Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fight for hearth and home.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hang out our banners on the outward walls; / The cry is still, ‘They come'; our castle's strength / Will laugh a siege to scorn." - William Shakespeare, Macbeth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control are Plains. Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Avenant's archers are also trained as poets, so that each arrow is guided by a fragment of verse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the flamingos said, ‘Get out of our nest - we can't be seen with the likes of you' So, the griffin ate them." - Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it." - Suq'Ata trader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not teach. I simply reveal." - Daudi, Femeref tutor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ethereal Champion this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles." - Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Archers, balliste - you can't even get near the island of Avenant." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Destiny, chance, fate, fortune - they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Icatia's once-peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." - Telim'Tor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples." - Gwendlyn Di Corci

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honorable in battle, generous in death. - Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Black creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu." - Roya, Zhalfirin archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope." - Gulsen, abbey matron

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Pearl Dragon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They knew Bantau was lost when, to hide the pearl he had found on the beach, he swallowed it - and soon grew wings." - Hakim, Loreweaver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you." - "Love Song of Night and Day"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes." - Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt." - Sidar Jabari

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think of me as the storm before the calm." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold your position Leave doubt for the dying" - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon." - Rashida Scalebane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices the creature they control with the highest mana value unless they pay that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest, that player chooses one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The griffin's shadow gives courage to the righteous and dread to the idle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a red spell, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flame grows gentle with but a little distance." - Orim, Samite healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Abduction enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once great literature - now great litter." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Up and down, over and through, back around - the joke's on you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the insult, then the injury.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreams' riches are easily spent. - Suq'Ata adage

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by {2}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as they discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural." - Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One moment I was walking along the beach, and the next I was high in the air, staring into a hideous smiling face." - Tarub, Suq'Ata sailor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath." - Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success." - Sidar Jabari

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest mana value. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest, their controller chooses one of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: An opponent chooses one - • You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. • You search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A master of tactics, the lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?" - Reveka, wizard savant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the tutors, a ‘poem of sand' was of little account, a ‘poem of ivory,' priceless." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth is a good thing, compared to poverty - your food is better, your robes are softer, and your companions have bathed more recently." - Kukemssa pirate

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The memory of your existence will fade like the final stars of morning." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The owl asks but never answers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leviathan, too Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?" - The Bible, Job 41:1

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She had expected death to roar, to thunder, to growl. She did not recognize it when it came hissing to her side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To hide the truth is more than folly - it is fatal." - Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is nature that gives us our boundaries and nature that enforces them." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vodalian rank is displayed by the colors and patterns of their skin. Beware the color red; that is the badge of the empress's favor." - Corbio, pearl diver

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When no falcons fly, beware the sky. - Femeref aphorism

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings." - William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . When the trees bow down their heads, The wind is passing by." - Christina Rossetti, "Who Has Seen the Wind?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you call decay, I call ripening. You'll gain no sustenance from this harvest." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their stench was vile and strong enough, but not nearly as powerful as their hunger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rhino's bargain - Femeref expression meaning "a situation with no choices"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strength it has, but at the cost of a continuous supply of energy. Such failure can bear only one result." - Execution order of Endrek Sahr, master breeder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist." - Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." - Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer." - Autumn Willow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack. Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Angels are simply extensions of truth upon the fabric of life - and there is far more dark than light."Baron Sengir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?" - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the baron knows of one." - Autumn Willow

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all shadows are cast by light - some are cast by darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Gravebane Zombie would die, put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. There is no greater guilt than discontentment. And there is no greater disaster than greed." - Lao Tsu, Tao Te Ching, (trans. Chan)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hecatomb enters the battlefield, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures. Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But I signed nothing" - Taraneh, Suq'Ata mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They shall drink sorrow's dregs. They shall kill those whom once they loved." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name - but those who go with her are never the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the poisoned land spreads, so does the nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is terrible how one brief action can live forever in memory." - Jolrael

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?" - Hakim, Loreweaver

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us." - Crovax

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise." - Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the alliance between Balduvia and Kjeldor deprived Stromgald of easy victories, its agents were forced to fuel their rituals with their own flesh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. - Suq'Ata saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets." - Shauku, Endbringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't get there from here. Well, you can - it just won't be fun." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance." - Eron the Relentless

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shamans? Ha They are craven cows not capable of true magic." - Irini Sengir

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an ‘amusing model' of their forebears' culture." - Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land You control enchanted land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we trade with those despicable elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them" - Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragonfire forged me a warrior." - Rashida Scalebane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands" - Maraxus of Keld

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Want all, lose all. - Zhalfirin aphorism

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest." - Suq'Ata trader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change." - Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O it is excellent / To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous / To use it like a giant." - William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From down here we can make the whole wall collapse" "Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero - everyone else just has to step back" - Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target. {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may bid life for control of target creature. You start the bidding with a bid of 0. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and gains control of the creature. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do." - Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do." - Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a rare display of ingenuity, the orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hiniya Behold the man of flint, that's me / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return." - Navajo war chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flog and Squee / Up the tree / See the army / Flee, flee, flee." - Goblin nursery rhyme/war cry

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear anything with teeth measured in handspans" - Norin the Wary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chains of leaping fire and sizzling lightning laid waste the artificers' handiwork, sparing not a single device.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lightning tethers souls to the world. - Kor saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are times solid ground gives precious little comfort." - Talibah, embermage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift. - Suq'Ata saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?" - Naimag, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I saw the wizard gesturing, but I didn't guess his plan until my aesthir cried out and went into a dive." - Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins." - Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? - Femeref riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Struggle, and you will only fan the flames." - Talibah, embermage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thinking of dinner made Squee realize that the forest was probably thinking the same thing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too." - Squee, goblin cabin hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player untaps all basic lands they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tonight we'll have a farewell feast. Cold corn porridge is not enough. / Let's peel papayas, pineapples, and mangoes, drink coconut milk, / and bake bananas." - "Love Song of Night and Day"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did clouds dance in his eyes, did thorns play at his fingertips?" - Shesul Fass, faerie bard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it there themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm. - Elven proverb

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tell you, there was so many arrows flying about you couldn't hardly see the sun. So I says to young Angus, ‘Well, at least now we're fighting in the shade'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . and when the farmer awoke the next morning, all the seeds from his field were once again in their sacks." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather fight on foreign soil. That way, if I lose I can blame it on the terrain." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Femeref Archers deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course; they have no faith to guide their darts." - Nuru, Femeref archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been insulted by drunks in a hundred inns, but never as skillfully or annoyingly as by those blasted brownies." - General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do we know what we're doing? Yes - the will of Freyalise." - Laina of the Elvish Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality." - Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When setting a snare, success depends not on the quality of the trap, but the quality of the bait.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No two see the same Maro.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player draws a card for each creature card in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring follows winter - Elvish expression meaning "all things pass"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mysterious people indeed. Their origins are as secret as their traditions." - Lord Magnus of Llanowar

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've dreamt of a second harvest but fear I will not see it." - Asmira, holy avenger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares - they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." - Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moving without sound, swift figures pass through branches and undergrowth completely unhindered. One with the trees around them, the dryads of Shanodin Forest are seen only when they wish to be.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's terrible power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it true that the apes wear furs of gold when they marry?" - Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

property.name: Rules
property.value: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) {1}{G}{G}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands." - Kamau, "Proper Passage"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player creates a 1/1 green Cat creature token for each untapped Forest they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too much work - it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits." - Grebog, goblin swine-rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put the card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?" - Maimun al-Wyluli, diary

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: ‘It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'" - The Arabian Nights, Junior Classics trans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step. {4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Amber Prison remains tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pass me from soul to soul, / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls. - Totem inscription (translated)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made." - Mishra

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With no further options, I was forced to don the mask." - Rashida Scalebane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and heavy swings the club.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ." - "Song of the Artificer"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work." - Urza, in his apprenticeship

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word - five ways to avoid harm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?" - Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Create X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Uh, does anyone have a flute?" - Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may play an additional land during each of their turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never miss what you never had.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ebon Stronghold enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ruins of Trokair enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {T}, Sacrifice Ruins of Trokair: Add {W}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Svyelunite Temple enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
